com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.utils

Class ChunkArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.utils.ChunkArea

  • public class ChunkArea
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all the chunks nearby a train. This information is essential for performing automatic chunk loading when keep-chunks-loaded is set. This takes care of tracking which chunks should be loaded or unloaded while the train moves.

    This class purposefully excludes any mention of MinecartMember and MinecartGroup to make it easier to test.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ChunkArea.OwnedChunk
      A single chunk that has one or more chunks neighbouring it with a minecart in it

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        public void refresh(org.bukkit.World world,
                    com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.LongHashSet coordinates)
        Refreshes this chunk area to contain all the minecart chunk coordinates in the set. After this refresh the added and removed chunks can be queried, as well as all currently managed chunks.
        Parameters:
        world - the minecarts are in (to detect world changes)
        coordinates - of the chunks all minecarts are in
